definition: seat of government/government repository (archive)/official residence/mansion/presidential palace/(honorific) Your home/prefecture (from Tang to Qing times)
head/chief/first (occasion, thing etc)/classifier for poems, songs etc

sentences.english: Brundtland was head of government for more than 10 years.
sentences.chinese: 前後10多年的時間裏，布倫特蘭一直擔任政府首腦。

sentences.english: We dined with royalty, heads of states, authors, and activists.
sentences.chinese: 我們和皇室，政府首腦，作家，社會活動家一起喫飯。

sentences.english: How many heads of state and government will be present at the opening ceremony?
sentences.chinese: 有多少國家元首和政府首腦將出席本屆亞運會開幕式？

sentences.english: In the United States, the president is both head of state and head of government.
sentences.chinese: 在美國，總統是國家元首民時也是政府首腦。
